title: Mosquito-Borne Breaking Bone Disease Spreads In Haiti
teaser: Transmitted by mosquitoes, the chikungunya virus causes rash, fever and excruciating joint pain. It has no cure. The good news: It's rarely fatal. Epidemiologists say the virus is headed to the U.S.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
